burger-boxes.name: Burger Boxes
burger-boxes.description: Discover our range of eco-friendly, compostable burger boxes. Perfect for takeaways and food trucks, these sturdy clamshells are available in multiple sizes to fit everything from standard burgers to gourmet creations.

takeaway-containers.name: Takeaway Containers
takeaway-containers.description: Our versatile takeaway containers are the ideal sustainable solution for a wide variety of meals. Strong, grease-resistant, and microwave-safe, they are perfect for curries, salads, and classic takeaway dishes.

fish-and-chip-boxes.name: Fish & Chip Boxes
fish-and-chip-boxes.description: Serve a British classic in truly sustainable style. Our fish and chip boxes are designed to handle hot, crispy food, offering excellent heat retention and grease resistance without the need for plastic.

thank-you-range.name: 'Thank You' Range
thank-you-range.description: Add a personal touch to every order with our 'Thank You' range. Featuring a friendly embossed message, this collection is a great way to enhance your customer's unboxing experience and build brand loyalty.
